font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 凝结,使变稠：to cause to become viscous or thickened into a coherent mass : curdle, clot
【例】The blood co-agulates to stop wounds bleeding.
【近】clot, congeal, jelly
【反】melt, liquefy, fluidify, dissolve 融化，溶解；thin 使变稀薄
【派】coagulant n. 凝结剂：an agent that causes a liquid to coagulate
【记】 co + glue胶水
